description.narrative: The Project's development objectives are to: (i) increase the coverage of ten prioritized Public Health Programs; (ii) reducepopulation's exposure to principal risk factors associated with collective illness; and (iii) improve the stewardship role andappropriate regulatory environment of the Nation's public health system. The Project aims to support Argentina's Federal HealthPlan and its objectives to reduce mortality and morbidity associated with collective illness.

provider-org.narrative: International Bank for Reconstruction and Development

condition.narrative: Cause each Participating Province, when applicable in accordance with the provisions of the Indigenous Peoples Planning Frameworkto carry out the applicable IPP in accordance with with its terms
Cause the Participating Provinces, through the Umbrella Agreemts to maintain during the exec. of the Proj. within the respectiveMSPs, technical staff in a number and with qualifications & experience
The Borrower shall, through MSN, jointly with the Bank & not later than 30 months after the Effective Date, review the PHAs, thePHA Eligible OP Costs & the Unit Costs, & adjust them as necessary
The Borrower shall, through MSN, not later than January 31, 2008, create and maintain throughout Proj. implementation, specificnat. budget line entries in its annual budget to record all expenditures
the Borrower shall, through MSN, monitor the implementation of the PHAs and compliance with the PHA Performance Indicators, on aperiodic basis, all under terms acceptable to the Bank.

title.narrative: Congenital rubella cases decrease to zero at the end of the Project (2010).

comment.narrative: Baseline value of congenital rubella was not known during project preparation, this indicator should be interpreted as 'Maintaincongenital rubella cases at zero throughout the duration of the Project'.
Already achieved.
No cases detected; thus indicator achieved.

title.narrative: Prevalence of smoking has decreased by 6.0% (2010).

comment.narrative: Risk factor survey of 2006.
The goal was calculated based on a 6% reduction from 33%, equivalent to 2 percentage points. This indicator has been alreadyachieved.
Indicator achieved. Risk factors survey of 2010.

title.narrative: 20 out of 24 situation rooms to be certified for the epidemiologic surveillance of vector-borne diseases.

comment.narrative: Situation rooms were under implementation in most Provinces
22 out of 24 situation rooms installed and certified in most Argentine Provinces.
Indicator was achieved during the first semester of the year.
Achieved indicator. Goal was ultra passed.
The Voluntary Blood Donations Program has achieved the highest rate of increase in the region of around 450%. Indicator wasachieved in 2012

title.narrative: 20 Provinces out of the 24 have a functioning monitoring system for supplies for vaccines

comment.narrative: Close to be achieved.
Close to reach the goal, Provinces are improving the systems.

title.narrative: 20 Provinces out of the 24 have a functioning monitoring system for supplies for TB

comment.narrative: Important advances.
Indicator is close to be achieved.

title.narrative: By the end of each year, at least 48 (out of 96) total Annual Performance Agreements have substantially met their commitments.

comment.narrative: Elevated possibility to be achieved before the closing date.
Signing and adhesion to Performance Agreements is now a regular policy in Argentina.

title.narrative: 20 Provinces out of the 24 have a functioning monitoring system for supplies for blood

comment.narrative: Progress is in process.

title.narrative: By the end of the Project, at least 750 Municipalities are members of the Healthy Municipalities Network

comment.narrative: Important advances.
Positive trend. Last semester was not evaluated.

title.narrative: By the end of the Project, at least 400 Municipalities are accredited as full members of the Healthy Municipalities Network

comment.narrative: Following trend, this indicator will be achieved before Project's closing date.
Advances are being consolidated. Indicator trend is very positive. Last semester was not evaluated.

title.narrative: 80% of Provinces (20 out of 24) are accredited for public health functions and programs developed with minimum standards and norms for all 10 prioritized programs

comment.narrative: Indicator achieved, in process of verification.
This goal has was achieved. The design of the certification process was positive. All provinces were certified, and verificationof achievements is in process.

title.narrative: Percentage of surveillance site nodes for the SNVS have increased from the current 2349 nodes.

comment.narrative: Indicator could be achieved before the closing date.
Important advances in this indicator. Next mission will verify new advances.

title.narrative: Argentina has certified the interruption of vectorial transmission of Chagas in 17 of the 19 Provinces with Chagas disease by 2010.

comment.narrative: The Gov. has requested modification of the Chagas indicator to reflect the efforts and progress has been made in the surveillanceand control of vector-borne diseases, as follows: 20 out of 24 health situation rooms certified for the epidemiologicalsurveillance of vector-borne diseases. The Borrower has also requested that the Chagas indicator is kept as a process indicator
A new strategic plan has been launched and it was agreed with the Government to modify this indicator as intermediate indicator.

title.narrative: Operative to collect blood from habitual voluntary donors

comment.narrative: Important advances.
Advances are very important. Project is closed to be achieved. This data reflects partial evaluation.

title.narrative: Provinces with multidisciplinary teams with capacity to produce health promotion and educational tools

comment.narrative: Substantial progress.
Advances are very important. The indicator could be achieved before the closing date

title.narrative: Percentage of Provincial and hospitals HIV Programs in electronic network with the National Program

comment.narrative: Important advances
An AIDS evaluation study showed important advances on this indicator. Next mission will verify new advances.

title.narrative: Improve sexual and reproductive health services supervision

comment.narrative: Important progress.
New data will be collected during the following mission

title.narrative: Fumigation of houses with chemical products

comment.narrative: Poor advances. Indicator will not be achieved.
Performance is very low. Vector-borne disease control has been focused on Dengue disease. No data to date. The Program ispreparinga report on this indicator.

title.narrative: 90% of cases of HUS reported by surveillance system are managed according to norms

comment.narrative: Important progress.
Epidemiological surveillance of hemolytic urinary syndrome is under continuous improvement, and expanded to all Provinces.

title.narrative: Authochtonous measles cases are maintained at zero

comment.narrative: Already achieved.
Indicator achieved before MTR. No cases during this year.

title.narrative: 90% of cases of rubella reported by surveillance system are managed according to norms

comment.narrative: Indicator achieved.
No cases of congenital rubella have been reported.

title.narrative: 90% of cases of measles reported by surveillance system are managed according to norms

comment.narrative: Achieved indicator.
Indicator achieved. All cases of potential measles have been investigated.

title.narrative: By the end of the project, each participating Province has 90% immunization coverage

comment.narrative: In progress, but needs to be re-evaluated with data collected during the last semester.
Important advances, however, this indicator could be not reached due to failures in a couple of Provinces in reaching the goal.

title.narrative: 85% of new reported sputum-positive TB cases are receiving DOTS in regular form according to norms

comment.narrative: The Province of Buenos Aires has been recently incorporated into this Project and has the biggest concentration of TB cases in thecountry, which has delayed progress towards achievement of this indicator.

title.narrative: By the end of the project, all Provinces have 95% immunization coverage for HepB

comment.narrative: In progress
Target nearly met. Cumulative data of 2011, and first semester of 2012 will confirm advances.

title.narrative: By the end of the project, all Provinces have 95% immunization coverage for BCG

comment.narrative: Achieved indicator

title.narrative: By the end of the project, all Provinces have 95% immunization coverage for HiB

comment.narrative: Close to be achieved.
The indicator is under the endemic corridor. Target nearly met

title.narrative: By the end of the project, all Provinces have 95% immunization coverage for MMR

comment.narrative: Close to achieve the indicator.
Target nearly met.
